accomEditOptions.title: What do you want to do with the property?

answers.label: De-register property
answers.info: This property will not longer be registered as accommodation, will no longer be liable for any related rules and taxes.

answers.label: Transfer property
answers.info: Make another person or organisation liable for this accommodation

answers.label: Property type
answers.info: What sort of accommodation it is, for example a hotel or campsite

accomDeregisterDate.title: When will this property stopped being used as paid visitor accommodation?

accomDeregisterConfirm.title: Are you sure you want to de-register this property?
accomDeregisterConfirm.validation: Are you sure you want to de-register this property?
accomDeregisterConfirm.description: You can register a property again at any time.

answers.label: No, keep it registered as accommodation

successBox.title: Success
successBox.descriptionPost: will stop being registered as accommodation on

accomDeregisterSummary.description: We have sent you a confirmation email.

whatNext.title: What happens next
whatNext.date: You no longer need to collect visitor levy for this property from
whatNext.contact: will contact you to confirm when they've closed their records for this property.
whatNext.records: You can still see records for this property.
